ygData.subject: Re: Re:Re: Guise of the Deceiver (Longish)
ygData.msgSnippet: Tell me about it. I have a whole backpack of stuff in my bank (fairly nice items too) that increase wis/int. Once I go gather my raw materials - silk, meat -
ygData.messageBody:
Tell me about it. I have a whole backpack of stuff in my bank (fairly nice
items too) that increase wis/int. Once I go gather my raw materials - silk,
meat - whatever - I switch into my crafting outfit - it does seem to help a
lot with successes and skillgain. Now, my 'fighting gear' is pretty
pathetic, hehe - but most sufficient for what I'm liable to be taking on.


> Since bards in general have low wis/int, lemme tell ya it's damn hard
> to raise some of these. But I think I've spent many a day fishing
> with my L20 buds. Or baking fish fillets for my monk friends. Making
> bleeding brains for people, and watching people's reaction when we
> all are drinking them. I have a great time doing all that.
